item.title: 20 Romantic Things To Do In Wine Country This Valentine's Day
item.description:
20 Romantic Things To Do In Wine Country This Valentine's Day

There will be plenty of love in the Wine Country air this Valentine's Day as couples celebrate not just the most romantic day of the year but a three-day weekend thanks to President's Day. We've rounded up 20 romantic things to do in Wine Country-10 in the Napa Valley and 10 in Sonoma County-so you can get started on your Feb.

item.title: Celebrate the 40th Anniversary of Napa Valley's Triumph over French Wines
item.description:
Celebrate the 40th Anniversary of Napa Valley's Triumph over French Wines

Auberge du Soleil is offering a five-course meal and special wine pairings in honor of the historic occasion...

item.title: Asian-style Meatballs in Lettuce Wraps | Wine Enthusiast Magazine
item.description:
Asian-style Meatballs in Lettuce Wraps | Wine Enthusiast Magazine

Serve this pan-Asian dish with steamed rice or with a warm piece of naan, a leavened flatbread of India. As for what to drink, go with a brew. A malty Tsingtao from China, a chilled Kirin from Japan or a citrus-scented Singha from India would all make for a winning pairing.

item.title: The California Rosés You Need to Stock Up On Now | Wine Enthusiast Magazine
item.description:
The California Rosés You Need to Stock Up On Now | Wine Enthusiast Magazine

By all accounts, the 2015 vintage in Northern California was exceptional, but what it wasn't? Abundant. It produced nowhere near what 2012 and 2013 did. And 2014 was a triple streak of quality and quantity in California wine. The good news? We still have plenty of great wine to look forward to.

item.title: French winemakers buy Robin Williams's Napa Valley estate - The Boston Globe
item.description:
French winemakers buy Robin Williams's Napa Valley estate - The Boston Globe

Robin Williams's ranch in Napa, Calif., has sold for $18.1 million to French winemakers Alfred Tesseron and his niece Melanie Tesseron, Top Ten Real Estate Deals has reported. The Tesserons own and operate Château Pontet-Canet, a vineyard and winery in the Bordeaux region of France.

item.title: Jim Kelly, other Bills greats taking Napa Valley wine tour
item.description:
Jim Kelly, other Bills greats taking Napa Valley wine tour

Feb 1, 2016 Mike RodakESPN Staff Writer Close Previously covered the Patriots for ESPNBoston.com Providence College graduate More than 25 years after making their first trip to the Super Bowl, Jim Kelly and some of his most well-known teammates are back at the Super Bowl this week -- as vacationers.

item.title: Napa Offers Hands-On Experience Through April | Patch
item.description:
Napa Offers Hands-On Experience Through April | Patch

NAPA, CA - The City of Napa has unveiled a DoNapa Behind the Scenes for visitors during the next three months. On Wednesdays and Thursdays in February, March and April, visitors can experience hands-on tourism with backstage tours the Uptown Theater or learning a chocolatier's secrets at Anette's Chocolate.

item.title: Four Seasons to Open 2018 in Napa Valley
item.description:
Four Seasons to Open 2018 in Napa Valley

Hotel Development California Four Seasons Hotels and Resorts, Alcion Ventures, and Bald Mountain Development today announced plans for a new luxury resort in Napa Valley. Slated to open in early 2018, the resort will feature 85 guest rooms and 20 Private Residence villas.
